text: Rockpalast Live is a DVD of Harry Chapin performing on German music television show Rockpalast on April 12, 1977. ==Track listing== # "Shooting Star" # "W*O*L*D" # "Mr. Tanner" # "Dance Band on the Titanic" # "Taxi" # "Six-String Orchestra" # "Corey's Coming" # "Blues Man" # "Mail Order Annie" # "30,000 Pounds of Bananas" # "Cat's in the Cradle" # "Circle" # "Odd Job Man" # "I Wanna Learn a Love Song" Category:Harry Chapin video albums Category:2002 video albums Category:Live video albums Category:2002 live albums
title: Rockpalast Live (Harry Chapin DVD)
